meaningMnemonic: Something <kanji>outside</kanji> your normal <kanji>idea</kanji> of how things work will come as <vocabulary>unexpected</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>surprising</vocabulary> to you.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
